title: Top Places to visit in Longleng, Nagaland
content: Longleng is a town situated at an altitude of 1066 metres above sea level in India. It is the district headquarters of the newly formed Longleng district in Nagaland,[2] and has a population of 7,613.[1] Mokokchung is the nearest major town. Phom language is the main language spoken here by Phom
